name: Briarsparrow

fey_step.description: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

season_effect.description: Immediately after using your Fey Step, each creature you choose that you can see within 5 ft. of you takes 3 fire damage.

divine_sense.description: As an action, you can detect good and evil. Until the end of your next turn, you can sense anything affected by the hallow spell or know the location of any celestial, fiend, undead within 60 ft. that is not behind total cover.

lay_on_hands.description: You have a pool of healing power that can restore 35 HP per long rest. As an action, you can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

fighting_style.name: Great Weapon Fighting
fighting_style.description: You can reroll a 1 or 2 on damage dice with melee weapons wielded with two hands.

aura_of_protection.description: While you are conscious, you grant all friendly creatures (including you) within 10 ft. a +4 bonus to all saving throws.

aura_of_warding.description: You and friendly creatures within 10 ft. of you have resistance to damage from spells.

channel_divinity.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to fuel magical effects. Each Channel Divinity option provided by your oath explains how to use it. When you use your Channel Divinity, you choose which option to use. You must then finish a short or long rest to use your Channel Divinity again. Some Channel Divinity effects require saving throws. When you use such an effect from this class, the DC equals your paladin spell save DC.

options.name: Nature's Wrath
options.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to invoke primeval forces to ensnare a foe. As an action, you can cause spectral vines to spring up and reach for a creature within 10 ft. of you that you can see. The creature must succeed on a Strength or Dexterity saving throw (its choice) or be restrained. While restrained by the vines, the creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, it frees itself and the vines vanish.

options.name: Turn the Faithless
options.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to utter ancient words that are painful for fey and fiends to hear. As an action, you present your holy symbol, and each fey or fiend within 30 ft. of you that can hear you must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

harness_divinity.description: You can expend a use of your Channel Divinity to fuel your spells. As a bonus action, you touch your holy symbol, utter a prayer, and regain one expended spell slot, which can be no higher than level 2. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feature.name: All Eyes on You
feature.description: As a Far Traveler, you have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you. In addition, others are inclined to think the best of you, and you are welcome in any place as long as you respect its customs.

faith: Titania, Queen of the Summer Court

appearance.notes: Briarsparrow's appearance reflects her connection to the Feywild, with an otherworldly beauty and a faint, ethereal glow.

personality_traits: I have different assumptions from those around me concerning personal space, blithely invading others’ space in innocence, or reacting to ignorant invasion of my own.
I express affection or contempt in ways that are unfamiliar to others.
ideals: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)
Adventure. I’m far from home, and everything is strange and wonderful! (Chaotic)
Beauty. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true. (Good)
Joy. It is my greatest duty to bring joy to my life and all the other lives I touch. (Good)
bonds: An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of the Feywild is an injury to me.
I am loyal to my beautiful queen, Titania, and will do anything she asks of me without complaint.
I will bring the beauty of the Feywild to this imperfect and diluted world I now inhabit.
flaws: I am secretly (or not so secretly) convinced of the superiority of my own culture over that of this foreign land.
I have a weakness for the new intoxicants and other pleasures of this land.

Gleaming Full Plate Armor.properties: Reflects light, giving off a faint glow
Gleaming Full Plate Armor.description: This armor is made of gleaming metal and is adorned with intricate designs that seem to shift and change in the light.
Gleaming Full Plate Armor.notes: Given to Briarsparrow by Queen Titania as a symbol of her knighthood

Flame Tongue Greatsword.name: Flame Tongue Greatsword
Flame Tongue Greatsword.description: This greatsword is made of fiery red metal and is adorned with intricate designs that seem to flicker and dance like flames.
Flame Tongue Greatsword.notes: Forged from the heart of a fire elemental. Worn in a scabbard on Briarsparrow's back. Integrates her holy symbol into its hilt.

damage.condition: Additional damage applied when the sword is flaming

special_abilities.name: Flame Tongue
special_abilities.description: As a bonus action, the wielder can speak the sword's command word to cause flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits.

passive_effects.description: Integrates Briarsparrow's holy symbol into its hilt.

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: A heavy crossbow made of polished wood and steel.

Boots of Elvenkind.description: These boots are made of supple leather and are adorned with intricate designs that seem to shift and change in the light.
Boots of Elvenkind.notes: Given to Briarsparrow by her brother Thorn as a gift

Cloak of Protection.description: This cloak is made of fine fabric and is adorned with intricate designs that seem to shift and change in the light.
Cloak of Protection.notes: Given to Briarsparrow by her father Aelar to celebrate her knighthood

contents.name: Eladrin locket
contents.description: A locket containing a portrait of Briarsparrow's family

contents.name: Feywild seeds
contents.description: Seeds from an ancient tree in the Feywild

organizations: The Summer Court: Briarsparrow is a knight of the Summer Court, dedicated to pursuing the will of Queen Titania.
The Knights of the Ever-Wakened Stars: A group of knights dedicated to bringing the beauty and joy of the Feywild to the material world.

allies.name: Aelar
allies.backstory: Aelar is a knight of the Feywild, dedicated to protecting the realm from threats. He is proud of Briarsparrow's dedication to her oath and her determination to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Tall and regal, with silver hair and piercing blue eyes.

allies.name: Lilac
allies.backstory: Lilac is a noble of the Feywild, known for her kindness and generosity. She supports Briarsparrow's dedication to her oath and her determination to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Elegant and graceful, with long silver hair and warm green eyes.

allies.name: Thorn
allies.backstory: Thorn is a ranger of the Feywild, dedicated to exploring and protecting the realm. He is proud of Briarsparrow's dedication to her oath and her determination to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Tall and rugged, with tousled brown hair and keen brown eyes.

allies.name: Ivy
allies.backstory: Ivy is a bard of the Feywild, known for her creativity and passion. She supports Briarsparrow's dedication to her oath and her determination to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Elegant and ethereal, with long golden hair and bright blue eyes.

allies.name: Erevan Sunshadow
allies.backstory: Erevan is a fellow knight of Queen Titania, dedicated to protecting the Feywild and its inhabitants. He is known for his charm and resourcefulness, and has been a valuable ally to Briarsparrow in her quest to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Tall and elegant, with burnished bronze hair and bright amethyst eyes.

allies.name: Kaulnin Thornheart
allies.backstory: Kaulnin is a half-orc druid dedicated to protecting natural spaces in and around Waterdeep. He is known for his stoic nature and unwavering dedication to his cause, and has been a valuable ally to Briarsparrow in her quest to protect the natural world.
allies.appearance: Tall and muscular, with weathered skin and piercing green eyes.

enemies.name: Zarvok Shadowmant
enemies.backstory: Zarvok is a Drow sorcerer seeking Fey artifacts for evil purposes. He is known for his cunning and ruthlessness, and has become a dangerous enemy to Briarsparrow in her quest to protect the natural world.
enemies.appearance: Tall and lithe, with obsidian skin and piercing red eyes.

enemies.name: The Shadow Veil
enemies.goals: Merge the Feywild with the material world
enemies.background: A cult worshipping a dark entity. Briarsparrow has encountered members of the Shadow Veil invading the Feywild and has followed their trail to Waterdeep.
